import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/types/{assetTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single asset type definition by its UUID. Asset types define categorization for inventory management (e.g., Devices, Peripherals, Network Equipment).

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types) to retrieve available types and extract `Items[].AssetTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List asset types: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types) to get available categories.
2. Extract the `AssetTypeId` for the desired type.
3. Call [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types/\{assetTypeId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-type) for full details.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetTypeId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset type to retrieve. Obtain from [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types) (`Items[].AssetTypeId`).","example":"80890234-150d-0d57-36f8-eb969cc7c059","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"listAssetTypes","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/assets/types","responseField":"Items[].AssetTypeId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
